item.title: TechCrunch Mobility: Rivian’s survival plan involves more than cars
item.description: Welcome back to TechCrunch Mobility — your central hub for news and insights on the future of transportation.

item.title: OnePlus 15 vs Samsung Galaxy S25 : comment choisir le meilleur smartphone haut de gamme ?
item.description: Se tourner vers Samsung est une évidence, lorsqu'on cherche un smartphone Android. Mais d'autres marques ont également des produits haut de gamme de très bon standing, comme le OnePlus 15 qui met tout le monde d'accord en cette fin d'année.

item.title: Voici les meilleurs écouteurs ouverts de l’année – Frandroid Awards 2025
item.description: Les meilleurs écouteurs ouverts testés par Frandroid sont les Shokz OpenFit 2 Plus. Découvrez pourquoi ce produit a reçu le Frandroid Awards avec Delos de sa catégorie.

item.title: Ayaneo's first smartphone is a major callback to the Xperia Play
item.description:
Close enough, welcome back Xperia Play. After releasing a teaser video in early November, Ayaneo fully revealed its first smartphone called the Pocket Play. As suspected, the Ayaneo Pocket Play features a sliding mechanism that transforms it from a chunky smartphone into a gaming handheld.
In its gaming configuration, the Pocket Play features a controller setup with a D-pad, ABXY buttons and four shoulder buttons. However, Ayaneo has modernized the Xperia Play design by incorporating two touchpads, which will also be seen in the handheld maker's next flagship device called the Next II. Accor...

item.title: Boulanger régale les gamers avec cet écran Samsung QHD de 27″ et 350 Hz bradé à un super prix
item.description: L'écran PC Samsung Odyssey G6 G60F est affiché à 399,99 euros au lieu de 499,99 euros sur Boulanger, de quoi s'équiper avec du matériel de qualité pour jouer dans de bonnes conditions.

item.title: Want to know which 2025 LG OLED TV to buy? I tested three models side-by-side, and there's one clear winner
item.description: I evaluated the G5, C5 and B5 side-by-side to find out which is the best overall value.

item.title: ‘The Batman Part II’ May Have Scarlett Johansson For a Killer Role
item.description: Johansson may wind up playing someone most people wouldn't have guessed (or known) for 'The Batman Part II.'

item.title: Inside the high drama of the iPhone 4
item.description: By 2010, the iPhone era was in full swing. Smartphones were still a new and unfinished idea - the iPhone had only just gotten copy and paste! - but it was clear that these big slabs of glass were going to change the way we did pretty much everything. Apple was also already on an […]
